title: Three Theories on Joe Manchin
description:
Is there any climate-saving legislation that could win the vote of U.S. Senator Joe Manchin? 
Guest: Jim Newell, senior politics writer at Slate.

itunes:title: Three Theories on Joe Manchin
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Why the West Virginia senator kept telling the Democrats ‘no’ on climate — and why the Democrats kept on asking.
